column_border_width=”none” column_border_style=”solid”][vc_column_text]

Alutech Aluminium And Glass has designed, engineered, manufactured, and installed high quality façades on some of the world’s most iconic projects such as Burj Khalifa, Burj Al Arab, Bahrain World Trade Centre Twin Towers, Dubai International Airport Concourses A, B, C & D, Emirates Towers, and many others.

We offer high performance solutions to all facade-engineering challenges.  We are proficient in building envelope bespoke solutions, coordinated design & engineering, production, and installation, all under a strict ISO 9001 compliance, which guarantees quality and consistency.
